knimeNode.name: Mixed Graphical Model (Model Extraction)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is a post-processing node which extracts networks from the previously calculated edge ranks.

fullDescription.intro: Extract mixed graphical models from edgeranks for different values of estimated false positives.
fullDescription.option: Upper Limit for the number of false positive edges in the resulting graph (FWER control)
Fraction of samples in which a edge as to be selected to be included in the final model

ports.inPort: A ranking of all edges as produced by the Edge Ranking node
ports.outPort: A list of edges including their weights
